title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.7 - Nonpotable water system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.7 - Nonpotable water system

State Regulations
A nonpotable water system is permitted for air
conditioning, equipment cooling and fire protection. Nonpotable water shall not
directly or indirectly contact food or equipment or utensils that contact food. The piping of any nonpotable water system shall be durably identified so that
it is readily distinguishable from piping that carries potable
water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
